page.title: 11MODERN FARMING
page.content:
Modern farms use machinery and computers.{Transponders}hang round the cows' necks to program the computer controlled quantity of feed for each cow.{Mower conditioners}revolve at 2,00 revs.per minute to bruise the grass to dry it more quickly.
A farm might have five tractors, a chemical sprayer, bale buggy, swathe turner, fertilizer spreader, corn drill, precision chop forage harvester, J.C.B. mechanical digger and a corn storage bin.
This{machinery}was all found on one farm in Nailstone, although many farms do not operate in such a mechanised manner.
